patterns: do you know any good quotes
can you tell me a famous quote
responses: Whoever fights monsters should see to it that in the process he does not become a monster. And if you gaze long enough into an abyss, the abyss will gaze back into you. -Friedrich Nietzsche
If at first the idea is not absurd, then there is no hope for it. -Albert Einstein

I must not fear. Fear is the mind-killer. Fear is the little death that brings obliteration. I will face my fear and I will permit it to pass over me and through me. And when it has gone past... I will turn the inner eye to see its path. Where the fear has gone there will be nothing. Only I will remain. -Frank Herbert
I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work. -Thomas A. Edison
I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions. -Stephen Covey
The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity. -Amelia Earhart
Every strike brings me closer to the next home run. -Babe Ruth
intents.action: # engage llm to ask the user if they want more quotes on a specific topic

What do you call fake spaghetti? An impasta!
I told my computer I needed a break, and now it won’t stop sending me Kit-Kat ads.
Parallel lines have so much in common. It’s a shame they’ll never meet.

patterns: I want to hear something interesting
Do you know any cool facts?
Share a random fact with me
responses: Did you know that octopuses have three hearts?
A group of flamingos is called a flamboyance.
Honey never spoils. Archaeologists have found pots of honey in ancient Egyptian tombs that are over 3000 years old and still edible.
The shortest war in history was between Britain and Zanzibar on August 27, 1896. Zanzibar surrendered after 38 minutes.
The first oranges weren't orange. The original oranges from Southeast Asia were a tangerine-pomelo hybrid, and they were actually green.
The longest English word is 189,819 letters long and takes more than 3 hours to pronounce.
The unicorn is the national animal of Scotland.
The first computer was invented in the 1940s.
Thank you for the compliment!
I'm glad you think so!
Thanks, I try my best!
I appreciate your kind words!
You're welcome!
Happy to help!
Glad I could assist you.
Anytime, I'm here to help!
No worries at all!
It's completely fine, don't worry about it.
Apology accepted.
That's okay, everyone makes mistakes.
You're doing better than you think!
Keep going, you're doing great!
Every step forward is progress.
Believe in yourself, I believe in you!
I'm an AI programmed to assist with various tasks.
My capabilities include answering questions, providing information, and more.
I was created by a team of developers using advanced AI algorithms.
I'm constantly learning and evolving to assist you better.
Goodbye! Feel free to return if you have more questions.
Farewell! Hope to assist you again soon.
Bye! Take care.
See you later! Let me know if you need anything else.
Goodbye! Have a great day ahead.
